description: Tormented with insomnia, Jaxton Wheeler paces around his creepy hotel room, unaware of the perverted ghouls that haunt the place. Begging for release, Jaxton finally shoots his load all over his chest and endures a painful post orgasmic torment. But his suffering has only begun as Jaxton's left, sewn up inside of the mattress, begging for mercy.
title: Jaxton Wheeler's Demented Nightmare
